scripts.build: pandoc source/index.md -o dist/index.html -s -c styles.css && pandoc source/part1.md -o dist/part1.html -s -c styles.css && pandoc source/part2.md -o dist/part2.html -s -c styles.css && pandoc source/part3.md -o dist/part3.html -s -c styles.css && pandoc source/part4.md -o dist/part4.html -s -c styles.css && pandoc source/references.md -o dist/references.html -s -c styles.css
